## ğŸ”„ Why Use a Third-Party Bridge?

Hemiâ€™s native Tunnel supports a range of popular ERC-20 tokens. However, some assets (e.g., USDC, USDT) are not yet integrated. In these cases, a third-party bridge provides:

â€¢ Fast bridging times.

â€¢ Established track record of security and reliability.

â€¢ Wide token support, including stablecoins like USDC and USDT.
